amendatorysection.catchline: License; when required; temporary practitioner; license.
amendatorysection.para: A license as a temporary practitioner shall be required before any person may act as a temporary practitioner, and no person shall assume any title indicative of being a temporary practitioner without first being so licensed by the department under the Cosmetology, Electrology, Esthetics, Nail Technology, and Body Art Practice Act.

crossreference.para: Credentialing, general requirements and issuance procedures, see section 38-121 et seq.
